title: Tell Everyone: Why We Share and Why It Matters
description:
Tell Everyone: Why We Share and Why It Matters by Alfred Hermida

Requirements: ePUB reader, 2.7 MB

Overview: Social media is taking centre stage in our world, challenging and unsettling 20th-century ways of living and working. No one is immune. Tell Everyone: Why We Share and Why It Matters is a groundbreaking work that delves deeply into how social media is reshaping the worlds of media, business, politics and activism
